title: New skins for xin zhao
body:
For this past year or 2 of playing league of legends i would like to see more skins on people like zin zhao and bruam so on. I am in the process of sketching some new champions and skins for xin zhao. If anyone agrees please send a comment so everyone can see your opinion on what i am saying. Please contact me league to see my sketches I'm not the best but I'm not the worst. hopefully i get some opinions on this by for now
{{champion:5}}

replies.body: how about bruam he does have that many skins

> [{quoted}](name=Xdeathlolliepop,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=lpn9B3Lu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-03T21:45:36.751+0000)
>
> how about bruam he does have that many skins

Because he is a newer champ. He has the default and 2 other skins already anyway.
xin got a new skin already the secret agent thing
